articles.author: Veronika Melkozerova
articles.title: Ukraine ready to compromise ahead of EU decision on launching membership talks - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Kyiv says it is ready to work to join the bloc.
articles.content: KYIV ­ The European Commissions recommendation that Ukraine start formal talks to become a member of the EU afforded a rare moment of joy to a country fighting off an invasion by Russia, Olga Stefani… [+2338 chars]
